items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

items.name: alert-dialog
items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: A container that groups related buttons together with consistent styling.

items.name: calendar
items.title: Calendar
items.description: A date field component that allows users to enter and edit date.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

items.name: carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: A carousel with motion and swipe built using Embla.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.name: combobox
items.title: Combobox
items.description: Autocomplete input and command palette with a list of suggestions.

items.name: command
items.title: Command
items.description: Fast, composable, unstyled command menu for React.

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — such as a set of actions or functions — triggered by a button.

items.name: date-picker
items.title: Date Picker
items.description: A date picker component with range and presets.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window, rendering the content underneath inert.

items.name: drawer
items.title: Drawer
items.description: A drawer component for React.

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — such as a set of actions or functions — triggered by a button.

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty
items.description: Use the Empty component to display a empty state.

items.name: field
items.title: Field
items.description: Combine labels, controls, and help text to compose accessible form fields and grouped inputs.

items.name: hover-card
items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field.

items.name: input-group
items.title: Input Group
items.description: Display additional information or actions to an input or textarea.

items.name: input-otp
items.title: Input OTP
items.description: Accessible one-time password component with copy paste functionality.

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: A versatile component that you can use to display any content.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Used to display textual user input from keyboard.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.

items.name: menubar
items.title: Menubar
items.description: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications that provides quick access to a consistent set of commands.

items.name: navigation-menu
items.title: Navigation Menu
items.description: A collection of links for navigating websites.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time.

items.name: resizable
items.title: Resizable
items.description: Accessible resizable panel groups and layouts with keyboard support.

items.name: scroll-area
items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Augments native scroll functionality for custom, cross-browser styling.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content.

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: Extends the Dialog component to display content that complements the main content of the screen.

items.name: sidebar
items.title: Sidebar
items.description: A composable, themeable and customizable sidebar component.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Use to show a placeholder while content is loading.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

items.name: sonner
items.title: Sonner
items.description: An opinionated toast component for React.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: An indicator that can be used to show a loading state.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: A responsive table component.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea.

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.

items.name: animated-text
items.title: Animated text
items.description: Generates animated text word-by-word with blur, highlights, links, and smooth effects.

items.name: autocomplete
items.title: Autocomplete
items.description: An input that provides real-time suggestions as users type into an input field, helping them quickly find and select from a list of matching options.

items.name: color-picker
items.title: Color Picker
items.description: A component to pick the color.

items.name: file-upload
items.title: File Upload
items.description: A file upload component with drag and drop or upload files.

items.name: gradient-path-background
items.title: Gradient Path Background
items.description: A set of SVG paths that animate as if being drawn. Great for tech hero backgrounds.

items.name: highlighted-text
items.title: Highlighted Text
items.description: Highlighted text with solid background and decorative markers for emphasis.

items.name: loading-overlay
items.title: Loading Overlay
items.description: A component to display loading state of the overlay area.

items.name: month-picker
items.title: Month Picker
items.description: A combobox to select a month.

items.name: multi-select
items.title: Multi Select
items.description: A combobox to select multiple options.

items.name: number-input
items.title: Number Input
items.description: An input to type number.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination with page navigation.

items.name: password-input
items.title: Password Input
items.description: An input that can toggle visibility of the password text.

items.name: phone-number-input
items.title: Phone Number Input
items.description: A component to select the country and input the phone number.

items.name: theme-toggle-button
items.title: Theme Toggle Button
items.description: A button to toggle the theme.

items.name: tilt-card
items.title: Tilt Card
items.description: Smooth tilt card that responds naturally to your cursor, giving the card a more polished, modern look.

items.name: year-picker
items.title: Year Picker
items.description: A combobox to select a year.

items.name: data-table
items.title: Data Table
items.description: Powerful table and data grids built using TanStack Table.

items.name: editor
items.title: Editor
items.description: Rich text editor built with Tiptap providing essential formatting tools and markdown support.

items.name: smart-filter
items.title: Smart Filter
items.description: Powerful component with search and filter by multiple conditions that can switch back and forth.

items.name: smart-form
items.title: Smart Form
items.description: Entire form component with dynamic fields render on top of the configuration.
